Name: U.S. Agent
Description: With the end of the Vietnam War, John Walker thought his dreams of becoming a war hero had also ended, until he learned of the Power Broker, who could give anyone superhuman powers, which Walker used to first become Super-Patriot and later, U.S. Agent.
FirstComicDescription: It's a bloody civil war! Captain America versus Captain America! After months of manipulation from the resurrected Red Skull, Steve Rogers finally confronts his replacement as Captain America: John Walker! Don't miss this gigantic issue!
